attributes.action: Hold a public referendum on the future of the Monarchy.
attributes.additional_details: There needs to be a vote with 2 simple options. Abolish or keep the Monarchy.
attributes.background: We the people want a referendum on the future of the monarchy. Whether the people of the UK want to become a republic or not. We live in a free democracy. We have not had a say on the last remnant of facism in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605594
